description:
A modified browser built using Electron that helps in responsive web development.


What's Changed
- Ability to Rotate Only One Device, Not All at Once by @WayneRocha in responsively-org/responsively-app#914
- Fix browser-sync issue related to Content Security Policy (CSP) by @crbon in responsively-org/responsively-app#931
- Fixed the crash when a custom device is added to the preview for the first time by @manojVivek in responsively-org/responsively-app#933
- Suppressed 'ready-to-show' events from webview to prevent unnecessary window focus stealing by @manojVivek in responsively-org/responsively-app#938
- misc: Other dependency version upgrades
New Contributors
- @WayneRocha made their first contribution in responsively-org/responsively-app#914
- @crbon made their first contribution in responsively-org/responsively-app#931
